title: City scene
creator_credit: George Kaczender, Gordon Burwash, Guy Glover and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: No matter where you go in the world, it is in the city square that you see the character and culture of a people. Filmed in Montreal, Athens, and Bangkok, this film makes interesting comparisons of life at the core of three great cities. Photography by Paul Leach.
creator_credit_for_label: George Kaczender, Gordon Burwash, Guy Glover and National Film Board of Canada
